text: @realDonaldTrump Its more like the Do Nothing White Supremacy Cho-Mo that we have in the White House that is more into what he can do for republicans rather than what he can do for the people of america; all politics set a side.  This isn't like the #COVID19 where it is only you. #TrumpUnwell
